name: SoundDot
description:
WIth the SoundDot you can place custom sounds all around your FigJam document. Make your Figjam environment more lively and surprise your colleagues by enhancing objects with all kinds of sounds. The SoundDot is scalable and unobtrusive so that it fades into different document styles.


How to use SoundDot:

  1. Add the Widget to your document.
  2. Set up your SoundDot by clicking it.
  3. Insert a URL to your .mp3 file.
  4. Scale your SoundDot if needed.
  5. Your SoundDot is now set up and clicking it plays your sound.


Note: You can setup a SoundDot only once - for using a different sound, simply create a new SoundDot.
